title: Neil deGrasse Tyson: "Starry Messenger"
description: Michael talks with astrophysicist and bestselling author Neil deGrasse Tyson, author of the new book "Starry Messenger: Cosmic Perspectives on Civilization." Original air date 27 October 2022. The book was published on 20 September 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Neil deGrasse Tyson, Michael Smerconish)
